Nightlight

Nightlight fired 25 energyballs against Stranato
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Stranato: You've got to be kidding me.
> 
> The disks hit. 1 hit the rock next to him and exploded in his face. 
Another
> hit him directly and exploded. He was nowhere in sight before the 
third one
> could connect. He was squished up, very tightly, against the rock. 
He digs
> away at the dirt, thinking about the burrowing abilities he once 
had as a
> spider...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@n...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 1:09 AM
> Subject: Chivtrons Shall Prevail
> 
> 
> > ::Grounded/Axis and Co./Lynxiz::
> > Grounded's memory's continued to flood back to him.  The other 
half, the
> > mechanical one, in a final fight over organic life and it's 
future on
> > Cyberetron proved a failure for the organic bot.  In the battle 
they
> > raged against each other.  With a qucik snap of his wrist the 
organic
> > bot lashed his special energon whips across his arch-enemy's face,
> > blinding him instantly. He remembers how the bot crazed, firing 
al over
> > the place, and with a crazy shot it all went black for the 
protector of
> > organic life.  The shot had put his spark into stasis lock. What 
had
> > happened to his foe, his evil half, he did not know. Until not 
long ago.
> >
> > Axis looked to Aerotaur. "All right, he's yours.  I am here if 
you need
> > me"  He then turned and noticed Windlord in some trouble.  He 
fired two
> > missiles at the traiter McGowan while Lokk and Seekker continued 
to fire
> > 25 shots each at the foe.
> >
> > Lynxiz ran out after Lynxiz and spotting Stranato decides it is 
time for
> > payback. Firing three discs set for 1 second explosion on impact 
at him.
